Serialized Form

  • Package mdraw.model

    • Class mdraw.model.ShapeChangedEvent extends EventObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • change

          String change
          The change type; one of "added", "removed" or "changed"

        • shapes

          Shape[] shapes
          the shapes added, removed or changed

    • Class mdraw.model.ShapeSelectionEvent extends EventObject implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • selected

          Shape[] selected
          Selected shapes

  • Package mdraw.ui

    • Class mdraw.ui.DrawPanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • model

          ShapeModel model
          The shape model operated by this panel

        • toolPalette

          ToolPalette toolPalette
          The tool palette shown in the tool bar

        • shapeChangedListener

          ShapeChangedListener shapeChangedListener
          Listener object for shape changed events. All shape changed events result in calls to repaint.

        • shapeSelectionListener

          ShapeSelectionListener shapeSelectionListener
          Listener object for shape selection events. All shape selections events result in calls to repaint.

        • mouseHandler

          MouseAdapter mouseHandler
          Handler of mouse events. All mouse events are forwarded to the currently active tool in the tool palette. Additionally repaint is called.

  • Package mdraw.ui.tools

    • Class mdraw.ui.tools.OvalTool extends Tool implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • model

          ShapeModel model
          Shape model where the rectangle is added

    • Class mdraw.ui.tools.RectTool extends Tool implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • model

          ShapeModel model
          Shape model where the rectangle is added

    • Class mdraw.ui.tools.SelTool extends Tool implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • model

          ShapeModel model
          The shape model

        • state

          SelTool.State state
          The current state of this tool

        • pos

          Point pos
          Position of the shape used in resizing

        • startPoint

          Point startPoint
          Mouse position representing the start of a dragging operation

        • selectionPoint

          Point selectionPoint
          Mouse position representing the end position of a selection action

        • selection

          Shape[] selection
          Selected shapes by current selection gesture

        • movedShapes

          Shape[] movedShapes
          Shapes moved in a moving gesture

        • shapeToResize

          Shape shapeToResize
          Single shape which should be resized

        • shapeToResizeCopy

          Shape shapeToResizeCopy
          Copy of the shapeToResize resized for feedback

    • Class mdraw.ui.tools.Tool extends AbstractAction implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • name

          String name
          Name of the tool. The name is used to identify this tool in the tool palette. Tools should have a unique name within the application.

        • palette

          ToolPalette palette
          Reference to the tool palette containing the tool

    • Class mdraw.ui.tools.ToolPalette extends JToolBar implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • tools

          Map<K,V> tools
          Map maintaining tools with their names as key

        • selected

          Tool selected
          The currently selected tool

        • btnGroup

          ButtonGroup btnGroup
          Botton group to allow a single tool to be selected in the tool bar
